English:
--------
Platform: PC
Language: English, Spanish, French, Italian, Polish, Russian, Danish
Available for: X360
Available at Stores
Developer: Gas Powered Games
Publisher: Square Enix
Genre: Strategy Real Time (Science Fiction)
Players: 1, 2-8 (online) (Competitive: 2-8)
Released: March 5, 2010 (Pegi: +12)

Description:
------------
Experience brutal battles on a grand scale! In Supreme Commander 2, players wage war by creating enormous customizable armies and experimental war machines that can change the balance of power in a given time. Take the role of one of the three enigmatic commanders, each representing a unique faction with a rich story that brings a new level of emotional connection with the genre of real-time strategy, or fight the battle online. Where do loyalties?

Features:
-----------------
* Tech 2 Engineering Suite: Increases the speed of construction ACU.

* Damage Stabilization System: Greatly enhances the rate of ACU repairs itself.

* Heavy Anti-Matter Cannon: The update for the antimatter cannon, Heavy Anti-Matter Cannon, increases the production of the ACU damage.
 
* Tactical nuclear missile launcher: This short-range tactical nuclear has a smaller range and the radius of destruction of a nuclear missile in full size. Strategic Missile Defense Systems can shoot them down.

* Personal Shield: Creates a protective shield around the ACU. The shield will vanish after taking enough damage and need to recharge before it can be reactivated.

* Personal Transporter: Instantly teleports the ACU almost instantly through a range that extends for several kilometers. The teleporter staff requires considerable energy to activate.
     
* Pod shoulder acts as a secondary engineer, attending the ACU, which is the construction or repair.
